card.name: Aeon Chronicler
card.text: Aeon Chronicler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. Suspend X - {X}{3}{U}. X can't be 0. Whenever a time counter is removed from Aeon Chronicler while it's exiled, draw a card.

card.name: Dichotomancy
card.text: For each tapped nonland permanent target opponent controls, search that player's library for a card with the same name as that permanent and put it onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Suspend 3 - {1}{U}{U}
